transcript:
Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch
Hellow.
Sir Roshan baat kar raha hu.
Ji Roshan ji.
Han, toh sir abhi jo bhi aapka concern tha uske related humne aapka pura keyword update kar diya. Aapse I am interested mark karwa diya. Thik hai?
Ji.
Aur aapne MQ wagera update kara diya. Toh please jo maine aapko bataya Roshan ji us baat pe gaur karo aap.
Bilkul, bilkul 100% sir, 100%. Dekho main, main aapse jhoot nahi bol raha. Mere under mein kaam karti hai, aap chaho toh apni team bhejo Makrana.
Hmm. 60-70 bande mere under kaam karte hai, meri factory mein.
Ji.
Mai ye chahta hu ke hamara yaha IndiaMART se kaam nikle toh mai meri team ko bhi lagau yaha se.
Sir bilkul aap, aap bilkul fikar na kare. Lekin aaj ka mere ko shayad char panch mahine ho gaye, koi bhi real kaam nahi nikla sir.
Sir aap bilkul fikar na kare. Dekhiye bulk lead ki requirement hai. Bulk lead ke liye wahi pe, dekhiye humne aapka keyword pura update kar diya usse aapki visibility expand ho jayegi, right? Aur uske sath sath mein humne product kehna chahiye Roshan ji mai aapki baat kaat raha hu, aapka sab kuch kehna chahiye aapki team mehnat bhi kar rahi hai, sab kuch sahi hai. Ji ji ji. Lekin ab leads wohi woh aa rahi hai toh aap isko opposite leke dekho sir ke aap time waste karoge ya kisi dusre cheez mein apna time lagaoge, mujhe toh ye samajhna hai bas.
Sir mai aapki baat bilkul maan raha hu. Aap mind mat karna lekin mai businessman wali baat kar raha hu, dhhandha karne wali baat nahi hai. Haan.
Mind bhi rakhne wali baat nahi hai sir dekho aapne paisa lagaya hua hai toh dhhandha karne ke liye lagaya hua hai, right? Ab aap mera ek dafa Abdul Khaliq ke naam se mera Facebook pe bana hua hai. Aap vishwas nahi karoge sir mai bistar pe leta hu janaza bolte hai hum isko janaze pe baitha hu. Ab waha se mere hai na mahine mein matlab do ya teen call original aa jate hai aur woh permanent kaam nikalta hai sir usse, mera ek woh page bana hua hai. Hmm.
Free mein mera kaam ho raha hai sir.
Sir mai aapki baat bilkul manta hu. Aapki team ne jo mere ko bade bade wade kiye the na woh dekhne ko nahi mil rahe sir. Paisa chaho toh aur le lo.
Sir baat paise ki nahi hai, baat aapke kaam hone ki hai, right? Haan, toh wohi nahi ho raha hai sir. Please aap samjhiye. Please aap samjhiye dekhiye sir aapki baat mai samajh gaya. Ab meri baat ek ki suniyega, hum log jo kar sakte the abhi filhal. Hmm. Right? Woh humne aap logo ko bhi dekho sir paisa aapne liya toh aap logo ko karna hai. Sab kuch meri baat aapki baat, aapki baat sun li na, ab thoda ek bari mujhe bhi bolne dijiye please. Hmm. Toh jo bhi iska primarily action ho sakta tha. Right? Woh sab kuch humne aapke sath baith ke video meeting mein kari, thik hai? Thoda sa aapke side se requirement ye hai ke recent wala aap request karte rahe. Hai na? Aapko 100% bylead milegi, thik? Hmm. Ek hafta hum aur check karte hai, ek hafte ke baad fir hum ek bari ko baithenge and we will try ki aap down kuch kar paye nahi kar paye, kaisa improvement raha, kaisa improvement nahi raha, we will look into this for sure. Ji. Right? Abhi kuch changes kare hai aapke catalog mein toh ek bar ko uska bhi asar ho jane dijiye. Full surely sir aap hamara bhi motive samajhiye, hamara bhi primary work yahi hai. Sir woh toh mai sabar kar hi raha hu na mai, aapne call kiya hai maine toh nahi kiya na. Sir bilkul sir, bilkul. Lekin sir aapka bhi agar koi concern aa raha hai toh hamari bhi toh primarily yahi banta hai na ke hum usko solve karke de. Maine toh sir aapke woh jo hai na kya Aryan Kumar mein unko batata rehta hu lekin koi response nahi aata. Mai nahi. Kaun Siddhant?
Aaryan Kumar hai na aapke IndiaMART mein jo customer ko jodte hai. Achha. Achha achha. Hmm. Chaliye koi nahi sir. Ye apne Siddhant bhai hai tumhare aur aur abhi jo woh kaam bata rahe the na woh hua nahi pura. Haan woh wala na toh usme humne wohi usme sir bahut sara password generate ho raha tha toh uske liye humne aapko whatsapp kar diya hai. Haan. Aur woh nahi hua kaam aapki team se nahi hua kaam woh. Sir ab ek baat bataye aap keh rahe the ki Vikas Vikas Gupta tha. Haan. Woh Vikas Gupta ji the woh ye bol rahe the mai kaha jab aapse nahi ho raha hai toh sir hamare se kaise hoga ye. Bole aap kar lijiye maine aapko ye samjha diya woh samjha diya. Ab batao sir aapki team se nahi abhi apan aapne humne milke ek ghanta waste kiya nahi kiya. Mai wohi keh raha hu sir ki usme bahut jyada password generate ho raha tha. Toh abhi do ghante baad humne aapko pura steps list down karke humne bheja hua hai whatsapp pe. Hmm. Maine aapko bheja hua hai, ek baar fir try kijiyega nahi toh fir baithenge. Nahi hai woh Siddhant ne maine dono ne try kiya sir nahi hua abhi toh ek minute toh hua call rakhe hue hame. Sir mujhe pata hai mai bhi yahi hu. Hmm. Mai bhi meeting mein tha sir. Hmm. Toh ho nahi raha hai woh sir. Toh ab aap bol rahe ho whatsapp pe bhej diya toh mai kaise karu? Jab aapse nahi ho raha toh mai kaise karu, jankar logo se nahi ho raha hai jis cheez ke expert log hai. Jaise mai abhi marble ka expert hu. Sir ek cheez mai batau aapko. Hmm ha ji. Aap na sir blame hi kar rahe ho sir. Jab se humne phone kara hai na, please aap bura mat manna. Hmm. Bura mat manna sir, lekin aap blame hi kare ja rahe ho. Hai na? Aapke sath humne bhi mehnat kari. Sir sir jo kaam nahi hua wohi toh bata raha hu aapko itne pyar se bata raha hu. Aapne mera do ghanta barbad kar diya aur bol rahe blame kar raha hu. Jo nahi hua wohi toh bata raha hu. Aise laga ke itna bhi nahi bol sakta kya aapko. Jo kaam nahi hua wohi bata raha hu ab aap bol rahe ho whatsapp pe bhej diya aap kar lijiye. Jab aapse nahi ho raha toh mai kaise kar lu sir. Kam se kam galti toh accept karo. Sir mai keh toh raha hu maine accept toh kari hai aapke samne. Ya mai aapke samne aise haa mein haa mila haa sir haa sir yes sir yes sir ye karta rahu. Sir aise sir aise baat karoge toh kaise solution ho payega sir. Ab aap mujhe bataye aapke sath mai bhi toh laga hua tha na, humne bhi toh charo taraf se koshish kari. Wohi cheez mai aapko bata raha hu sir aap keh rahe ho ki maine maine aap keh rahe ho ke mai whatsapp pe bhej diya humne ab usko bhejane se kya hoga sir. Ek bari aap puri baat sunenge. Aap karne denge mujhe please. Aap bolo mai chup hu bilkul shant. Haan toh complete karne dijiyega sir please. Maine aapko ye bola ki sare steps ke sath mein humne aapko pura steps bheja hua hai, ek bar ko kyuki abhi bar bar woh aapka OTP generate ho raha tha is wajah se woh OTP galat bata raha tha. Ek bari jab aap free honge do teen ghante mein ek bari aap fir try kijiyega agar fir nahi hoga toh hum bhi yahi hai maine mera number bhi maine aapke sath mein share kara hua hai aur inka number bhi aapke sath mein hai Siddhant ke sath mein. Toh hum milke usko karwayenge sir kaam, hum kaam karwane ke liye aapko mana nahi kar rahe. Hmm. Right? Woh kuch technical issue hoga ki bar bar OTP regenerate ho raha tha. Right? Hmm. Toh is wajah se woh dikkat aa rahi thi toh kyuki aapne bahut time se woh nahi kara hua tha toh jitne bar aapne click kara tha na pehle bhi. Woh bar bar regenerate woh Vikas ji ne Vikas ji ne jo karwaya wohi kiya maine. Mai bilkul ab mere payment dalo sir. Are sir. Mere ko toh pata hi nahi ke sir joho app hota hai ya nahi hota hai aapke through pata chala sir. Dekho fir aap complete karne nahi de rahe ho sir. Aap fir beech mein kaat de rahe ho. Ek bari mere ko aapne jo bola na ke aapne woh kiya hua hai bar bar maine nahi kiya sir woh Vikas ji ne jo mere ko karwaya woh kiya. Mai nahi kiya, nahi nahi sir maine kiya. Hmm. Thik hai maine kiya. Toh woh kyuki bar bar generate ho raha tha. Are sir aap please bolne doge sir. Aap hi bol lo mai sun leta hu aap please bolo. Mai do minute silent rahunga aap bolo sir. Mai toh ye keh raha hu aapke jo Vikas ji hai na unhone mere ko ye joho app abhi aap woh us din download kya kehte hai download toh aaj karwaya. Unhone ye sab kuch kiya tha. Ab usme meri kya galti mai thodi janta hu ke isko link karna hai ya woh karna hai aapki team hi batati hai na sir. Toh maine aapko kya bola sir ki woh bar bar generate ho raha tha is wajah se shayad abhi nahi ho paya kuch technical glitch hoga kyuki hum generated OTP dal rahe the toh woh galat bata raha tha yahi hua tha sir. Hmm. Right? Ji. Toh ek bar ko jitna bhi ek ghante do ghante mein woh generate hota hai apne aap woh hone dijiye. Do ghante baad teen ghante baad hum ek bar ko aapko steps bhi bheja hua hai sare humne humne sath mein milke kare. Ek bar aap apne se try kijiyega nahi hota hai aapse toh fir hum log sath milke karenge, mai toh yahi bol raha hu na sir. Okay. Humne kya galat bola sir aur kya hum bol rahe hai ke humne nahi kiya ho. Hmm. Aur bataye. Yahi cheez aap hum usko try karenge aap do ghante baad fir try kijiyega agar hota hai toh thik hai nahi hota hai toh mera number aapke pass mein hai Siddhant ji ka number aapke pass mein hai. We will connect again aur hum usko sort out karenge. Okay. Hum aapko mana nahi kar rahe ke hum aapka kaam nahi karenge. Ji. Right? Aapka jo keywords wagera update karna tha woh catalog humne pura ka pura update kar diya. Pure catalog pe humne woh sari cheeze update kar di. Aapka sir koi apna youtube channel wagera hai kya? Banaya toh hai. Toh sir uske sare videos wagera aap dal do na. Product mein na add videos ka option aata hai. Ji. Right? Ji. Woh sare videos aap dal do isme. Chalo woh dal denge. Jitne videos aap dal sakte ho. Aage dale hue hai mere 15-20 toh dale hue hai. Haan haan, matlab jitne aap dal sakte ho kyuki usse aapka catalog score bhi better hoga. Hmm. Right? Aur baki sari cheeze bhi better hongi. Aapka online presence wagera bhi better hoga. Ji. Keywords wagera maine sab sare mein aapka update kar diya hai. Sab mein do do keyword update kar diya hai it will eventually aapka jo increment hai visibility hai. Ji. Woh aapka improve karega. Okay. Ek hafte tak please aap jis tarah humne bataya hai recent wala section mein us tarah se aap koshish kijiyega bylead consume karne ka. Koshish kijiyega ki jo non official hour hota hai. Ji. Jaise 6 baje se pehle 7 baje ke baad raat mein ya 8-9 baje ke pehle subah subah, right? Ji ji ji. Koshish kijiyega ki us samay pe bhi aap aap active rahe taki us samay pe bylead wagera ke kyuki itna sir us samay jyada log active hote nahi hai. Hmm. Aur bylead hamare pass mein 24/7 aati hai. Ji. Hai na? Ji ji ji. Toh woh bylead consume karne ki probability aapki achi ho jayegi. Ek hafte hum is cheez pe kaam karte hai. Mai ek hafte baad ka fir reminder laga leta hu aur ek hafte mein fir se ek bar koshish karte hai baith ke hum sari cheeze aur kya improve kar sakte hai woh hum koshish karenge. Next Friday ko milte hai apan. Done hai sir. Ab aap bataye kuch aur concern aapka pending ho kuch aur hum aapka cheez matlab woh kar sakte hai toh aap hame bataye sir we will try our best. Bas yahi tha sir maine bata diya aapko jo ha baki aap dekh kya cheeze puri karwani hai woh aap dekho mai toh live aa sakta hu aapke sath live aa sakta hu zoom sakta hu aap. Sir mai bhi aap bhi dekho sir mai bhi aapke sath do ghante se baitha hua hu. business agar badhega woh mai apne fayde ke liye aapse jud sakta hu. Mai bhi yahi keh raha hu ki do ghante se hum bhi aapke sath mein lage hue hai hamara bhi priority yahi hai ki hum aapki problem solve kare. Okay okay. Thik hai sir. Aap please befikar rahe hamare se jo bhi best ho payega hum pura best karenge aapke liye. Ji ji. Aap pura videos wagera jitna dal sakte hai woh sare videos aap dal dijiyega. Ji. Thik hai aap jitna brochure dal sakte ho minimum order quantity dal sakte ho woh bhi please aap dal dijiyega. Thik. Aap woh joho wala login karne ki koshish kijiyega nahi ho payega toh aap please mujhse connect kar lijiyega mera number aapke pass mein shared hai whatsapp pe maine kara hua hai, right? Ji. Thik hai toh sir aapke pass mein na Siddhant ji ka aapne ek feedback diya tha not satisfied ka. Hmm. Toh ek bari fir feedback ke liye jayega toh please aap is bari satisfied mark kar dijiyega. Let's work for one week aur fir usi accordingly hum next procedure dekhte hai. Thik hai sir? Ji. Ji. Chaliye aur koi baat sir aap batana chahe? Bas yahi hai sir. Chaliye kaam karte hai sir we will do our best. Aapko hamare taraf se hamare effort mein koi kami nahi milegi that I can assure you aur for that matter aapko business bhi milega. Aur dekh lo kuch baki hai toh abhi naya naya kaam start hua kuch karwana ho judwana ho dekh. Nahi nahi catalog wagera sir humne pura update kar diya aapka already. Okay. Haan aapka catalog quality score 84% ho gaya. Aap sirf apne videos dal dijiyega aur minimum order quantity jitni mein bacha hua hai woh dal dijiyega. Aap apne side se jitni jyada bylead consume kar sake please aap bylead consume kijiyega. Okay okay. Thik hai sir? Okay sir thank you. Okay thank you sir. Have a good day. Thank you. Good evening.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting real work.

- Customer is blaming the executive.

- Customer is unable to login to Zoho app.



Resolution:

- Executive updated customer's keywords.

- Executive asked customer to update MQ.

- Executive assured to solve customer's problem.

- Executive shared steps to login to Zoho app.

- Executive will connect again after one week.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try to login to Zoho app.

- Executive will connect after one week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, keywords, youtube, zoho app
